entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
